website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want a mid-level Vitamix in terms of size, power, and price.
pros: Has a 48-ounce capacity that's fairly compact and perfect for making portions that aren't too large or small
Self-cleaning function makes cleanup a breeze
cons: Somewhat basic and doesn't have programmable settings
A bit under-powered compared to some other models by the brand

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing. Who are all the 5 stars coming from?!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is incredibly disappointing. I can't make a smoothie without needing a lot of liquid. It's also incredibly loud. My boyfriend has a 5200 that's way older than my E310 and I couldn't believe how quiet it is. How is my unit newer and louder?! He can also make smoothies, nut cheeses, and nut butters without having to use liquid or as much liquid as me. New products should be improvements on older products. I want to return it and buy an older model.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Cali

customer_reviews.title: Dope blender
customer_reviews.text: Dope blender. I pureed soup to a velvety texture in 30 seconds. Then made a lemon slushy. Super easy to clean, assemble. Fits under kitchen cabinet. I didn't think it was too loud. The container shape is still narrow, even though its shorter, so some of the problems that others have had with the short fat containers are avoided. I'm still figuring out how to use the pulse button, or why its even there. I highly recommend this blender, and unlike other reviewers here I was not provided with a free product. Just a dude who likes his new blender.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Really??
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product and we are thrilled with the quality, the quiet and the speed. However....thanks Amazon for zero packaging (enviro friendly, and all) but also thanks for showing every single car that passed my house my new purchase. Glad it was still on the porch by the time we got home. Not cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blender
customer_reviews.text: Works well. If it seems like the motor is spinning but the blades aren't, stick the plastic rod in and spin it around.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Vitamix standards
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a much better blender. I realize this one is the bottom price point for Vitamix, but it performs very poorly. It takes much too long and too much effort for a simple smoothie with ice and fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Todd

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this freaking thing. I had a nutri bullet which left my smoothies chunky and sometimes I would have to blend my drinks twice just to get it to be smooth. The price of this beast is what scared me the most but after some research and balls I made the purchase. Luckily amazon allowed me to make interest free payments. I use it everyday. My drinks come out amazing. I can even start making my own nut butters with this thing and I can’t wait. I got the 48oz because it’s just me and it makes more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a reconditioned unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a reconditioned unit yet the description doesn't say reconditioned and it is the same price as a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective E310 vitamix?
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the E310 vitamix blender and the plastic container doesn't fit securely on the base. Is this a defective product or is that the design?
customer_reviews.author: linda sweet marksAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used it once, motor stopped in the middle of blending and never started again. I don't care what kind of warranty this comes with, I'm not fooling around trying to troubleshoot and get it fixed. For $300 I shouldn't have a single problem until I've used and abused it for years. So disappointed and upset. If Vitamix doesn't want people to buy the "budget" version, don't sell one - make everyone buy the $750 version if that's the only one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke with a whole
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with it until it made a whole while blending my smoothie this morning. Just 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dress with Ease

customer_reviews.title: A terrible product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Our new Vitamix E310 is defective, and reading other reviews this is a common occurance. Ours will only blend water, put anything like fruit, veggies, even garbanzo beans and the blade stops turning (but the motor is still humming). And trying anything like frozen fruit brings this Vitamix to a complete stop. If I could give this a zero star I would. So disappointed in Vitamix, they have lost me as a customer forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Blends really well and consistent, but there are some things that could be better. On speeds higher than 5 the unit moves on the counter. Cleaning the unit is slightly difficult as the blade is attached so your rag or sponge gets stuck on the sharp blades and you can easily cut yourself if you are not careful. The base is very large and it would be better if it was smaller if able to without decreasing the power. If you are blending anything longer than a few minutes you can begin to smell the motor burning which is not a reassuring thing.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix E310 Explorian Blender : Product not working out of box
customer_reviews.text: This blender never worked. Its surprising, Vitamix has such a reputation and it's costly too. I am within the time limit to return this item, so I will return this. For some reason, Amazon said they could not send an exchange product. Amazon suggested to return it this item and buy it again. I received a good deal on Thanksgiving and I don't want to buy this at full price, especially when there a possibility that it might not work again. I wish Amazon was able to send out exchange item.
customer_reviews.author: Hemchandra Hingne

customer_reviews.title: ... used a bullet and a ninja and was really happy with them until they stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: I've used a bullet and a ninja and was really happy with them until they stopped working after a year. Heart sinking I took the plunge into Vitamix. To look at what arrived for $300, I almost packed it back up with out even using it...Well I'm so glad I tried it out...I've already made soup and a smoothie, time will tell on the design...but with the guarantee, I feel more at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brooks-Ondeck

customer_reviews.title: Not good for singles,  but great for couples to small families!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this blender. The noise level can be really loud. It sounds like a small airplane is landing in my kitchen when I have it at full power, but I expected this since I read lots of reviews before I bought it. However, something I didn't expect was that it is not very useful if you are only making things for one person. All the reviews I read said it worked great for singles up to small families. Actually, it works good for couples up to small families, but if your often blending for 1, you will need to buy the small blending container attachment which is $100. I wish I had known this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first Vitamix purchase
customer_reviews.text: I go through blenders and food processors like they are going out of style. Since going vegan/plant based eating, I find that I have to make a lot of things versus buying premade items at the store like oil free/dairy free salad dressings, smoothies, sauces, etc. I found this to be a great mixer/food processor. I was a little skeptical about it's blending power after seeing the small blades at the bottom. I was using a Ninja before this purchase. I was pleasantly surprised how well it blended and smooth things turned out. I have definitely gotten my money's worth with this purchase. Great size for making things for 1-2 people.
customer_reviews.author: pakcolumbus

customer_reviews.title: Good blender but maybe not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: Decided to upgrade my blender and am happy with the vitamix but don’t think this particular one is much better than my ~$100 blender I had prior to this. I primarily use it for fruit and veggie smoothies and it struggles to incorporate top layers, even when loading it according to the vitamix recommendation. Not unhappy but probably wouldn’t recommend. My Oster worked just as well...
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: This product is awful
customer_reviews.text: This blender is extremely inconsistent, especially at its price point and product reputation. It takes up to 20 minutes to blend anything that has frozen products in it, and I constantly have the stop, mix it up, and try again. It has good days and bad days, which is unacceptable for a blender that costs over $250. Also, the return policy to try and get a new, or better working blender was disappointing. Would not recommend this blender, especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size if you plan to make 2-3 servings. I was debating between this one or the vitamix with the original, larger container, but I'm happy I went with this one. It blends just as well (my mom has the original one), just remember it is not going to make as many servings. I didn't think i would use this every day, like how some reviewers say they do...but I too end up using it everyday,multiple times a day. Wish the warranty was longer, and that it came with the larger cookbook, but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Like others who have commented, I was reluctant to spend this much $ on a purchase that was not a handbag 😉 but I’ve used this 2x so far and I’m still experimenting to get the perfect texture and taste. My previous Breville had a thousand pieces to clean, this is a breeze to clean and use, not as loud as some have also comment about , and I’m on my way to drinking my veggies. The best purchase of 2020 so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barb G

customer_reviews.title: Helps get more leafy greens into my diet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to get more leafy greens into my diet without all the chewing. I use tomato juice as a base, add lots of spinach, and in moments I can drink more spinach than I could ever eat. I use it at least twice a day for this and my morning detox smoothie. It's a cinch to clean and it's not very loud. It's so powerful that I haven't yet used the top speed. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Like no other blender!
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying this for a long time because of the cost. However, when our old blender died I wanted something that would be powerful. This baby is very powerful and can handle ice beautifully. I have made smoothies and nut butter and had no problems at all. I have yet to try the other features and recipes, but I’m looking forward to it. This is a very powerful blender that is capable of doing so much very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Blends very well!
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Noise level is mild on low speeds and acceptable at high speeds. My only complain is the plastic vase. Why not have a glass or stainless steel option.? I blended a bit of tumeric and the vase is still a bit yellow -.-
customer_reviews.author: Cesar R. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: We love our Vitamix and wish we had purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I have not been one to buy kitchen gadgets, primarily because of space limitations. But, as we make strides to eat more healthy, less processed foods, our doctor mentioned that she fixes a fruit and/vegetable smoothie for her breakfast and it satisfies her appetite until lunch. I shopped around and he Vitamix made sense for a quality, long-lasting choice. We love it! It is used daily by both of us and is so easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: DP in WA

customer_reviews.title: Plastic piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this blender. Spent a lot of time researching different vitamix blenders to purchase as a gift. The outside is all plastic construction and does not have the feel of a $300 blender. The controls are awkward and the machine is very loud. The blending power was underwhelming - I have to keep adding more and more liquid every time I make a smoothie or else the blender just binds up. The 48 oz pitcher is also way too small. I have a kitchenaid blender I bought on sale at Macy’s for about $80 that is just as good and possibly better. As far as I’m concerned this brand is overhyped!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Adam Bussone

customer_reviews.title: Pricey Average blender with heating elements
customer_reviews.text: I love my vitamix because i can make hot soup or cold soup. I can do so much. I just recently discovered that it doesn't blend if you put only frozen stuff in it. You have to add a liquid for it to properly blend. It's easy to clean and the noise level is average. Overall I love it! But i think i paid too much.
customer_reviews.author: Makin Me Happy!

customer_reviews.title: Probably my favorite purchase of 2017
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. After years of spending less on machines that looked like a Vitamix but did not deliver (like the Ninja), I finally spent the money on this model and I am very happy I did. I've never had a machine that blends to this consistency. It is actually quite remarkable. I use loads of greens like kale and spinach and they come out smooth and drinkable every time. **Tip, when mixing greens put them in first and then the other stuff on top, it makes a big difference in getting it all blended smoothly. The difference in quality has made a big difference in the number of vegetables and fruit I eat.
customer_reviews.author: DanNyc

customer_reviews.title: First Rate Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this now for 18 months. It’s been the best smoothie maker ever. A couple weeks ago, the motor began to “slip” and nothing would blend. One phone call to the Vitamix warranty department got me an emailed return shipping label at no charge. I boxed up my Vitamix and shipped it out UPS at no charge. Exactly one week later, I had my Vitamix back, again free of charge, and working perfectly. Their customer service is first rate and so is their 5 year warranty. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: zenyatta

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It fits well in my small kitchen. I’m very happy with its blending capabilities. Noise level depends on level of speed. I have not needed to use super high speed to get a great bend so the noise is no issue for me if you go to top speeds it’s loud but even that’s not a problem as far as I’m concerned. I use it primarily to blend raw vegetables for healthy drinks and that works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: OV

customer_reviews.title: A Powerful Blender. 48oz jar perfect for a couple.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Vitamix E310. I wanted a powerful blender without frills and this is perfect. I also didn’t want the 64oz jar, so I prefer this one since it’s 48oz. It’s just the two of us at home so this works for us. I made coconut chutney as a test and it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vedika jiandani

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I've ever used hands down....love this model too
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other expensive blenders that were supposedly just as good as a vitamix and they just dont have the capability. Not only does a vitamix reach a consistency Ive yet to match with another blender, but the tamper makes the job so much easier so that you dont have to keep removing the lid to scrape the sides down. Powerful, effective, incredibly easy to clean. The E310 is also a nice size pitcher and can be stored on the counter under the top cupboards
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I use it to make protein shakes for workouts almost every day and for chopping up vegetables for cooking (saves so much time). Never had any real problems. Super easy to clean. It shakes a little and I feel like I have to hold it still at the higher speeds but at least it isn't sealed (sealed blenders can explode!)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After owning a Professional Series Vitamix Blender for many years and loving it, I decided to buy the E310 for our motorhome because of the smaller size container. After assembling the blender, I realized the container doesn’t fit firmly on the base. When in use, the container turns from side to side and vibrates to the point where I am concerned that it will bounce off. I know this is an entry level Vitamix, but it is still $349 and I feel that the container should fit snugly on the base.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: I regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I could NOT get any personal cup attachments with this unit. Very limited. The power is NOT what I thought it would be. My $98.00 Nija did as good a job at making nut butter. Over priced, under powered and no expand-ability. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob&Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This blender works when it feels like it. When it wants to work it does a nice job but more often than not the the engine runs but the blade doesn’t spin. Takes me forever to make a smoothie. Very disappointing for the amount of money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: It works. It blends kind of heavy duty. However, its design is kind of flawed given its price. First of all, when you spin your blend twice, it will easily explode out of your lid . Another review mentioned doing a clean-test with water half-full and water spilling out. Pretty much true. Also, liquid tends to drip down the blender when pouring. Trust me when I say this -- for this price, get another one. Functional ... kind of but inconvenient and not consumer-centric design.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  REVIEWS  SRE NOT ACCURATE!  YOU WILL RETURN IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely horrible. The bullet is way better. Like other people stated why are there any good reviews. It must be employees or their families of then company. Have to add a bunch of liquid. A bunch! Extremely loud.
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: very powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It took a long time to convince myself to spend this much money, but for me it is worth it. I have only had it a couple of weeks, so mostly we have made smoothies, but I want to do some juicing in the future. It is a little noisier than my old blender. but that is because it is much more powerful. I have chopped meat in it when I wasn't able to eat whole meat for a day or so. it worked well for that.
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best smoothies and milk shakes!
customer_reviews.text: Yippie, love this blender! I should of purchased several years ago. Powerful and easy to use and clean. It sits on counter during the week for smoothies. Our favorite time to use is when the grandkids are here and we make milkshakes....quick and makes thick, smooth drinks!!
customer_reviews.author: Gma Grettie

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than Cleanblend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Cleanblend model first, hoping to save some money. The Cleanblend blender was noisy—like most blenders are—and left an ozone or burning odor after every use, which worried me. I bit the bullet and upgraded to a Vitamix 310, and it's like night and day. The Vitamix purrs softly in use, and doesn't give any indication it might be working hard. The Cleanblend jar fits the Vitamix base, so I'm leaving the Cleanblend in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, blends really well
customer_reviews.text: My only complain would be that if you leave it on for a bit it’ll start smelling like something is burning. But it blends things really well and it’s extremely easy to clean, I just rinse it, pour some water and soap, turn it on, rinse it again and that’s it. No need to use a sponge. I also really like the color (red), although I wish for the price it came with some accessories. Haven’t made anything other then smoothies so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they make it sound!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. I spent over $300 for a mixer against my better judgement for my daughter’s 18th birthday. I expected to be able to put ingredients in the mixer, blend it and have the perfect smoothie. It DOES NOT WORK!! Do not waste your hard earned money. It clogs at the drop of a hat. Takes forever to get a smoothie made because we constantly have to fiddle with it. So so so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Vitamin for two reasons, supposed to be the best and American made. It is just terrible. Cannot even make a smoothie with pineapple, bananas, and yogurt. When you put the ingredients in the blender will start to blend and then it seems to stop blending. It seems like the motor is going but nothing happens. Definitely not worth the money. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ava Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Check it out carefully
customer_reviews.text: The blender we got was broken and seemed to be used. Not very happy about that. We expected better from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Leon Mills

customer_reviews.title: Compact, high quality product for lower price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for Mother's Day, and might be the first time I bought something useful and long-lasting for her. Powerful, not obscenely loud, easy to clean as Amazon asks me to rate them. The warranty on it and the quality of smoothies we've made so far has been outstanding. We particularly like the compact size/height so it fits on our counter under the cabinets.Everything you'd expect in a Vitamix, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I can only use this blender with liquids. Sometimes pieces of fruits get stock and not properly blended . Good for smoothies but it isnt good when I tried to use it to blend nuts.. I have to use two separate blenders to polvorize nuts and for dry foods.
customer_reviews.author: MENA

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this Vitamix blender. I use it to make veggie and fruit smoothies (no straining required), almond milk, nut butters, soaked grain and legume batters, chutneys, frozen fruit ice creams and crushed ice for frozen margaritas. Use ice cubes to prevent smoothies from heating up. The noise is high only towards the last 3 settings. Watch the product demos to enjoy this powerful blender. Grinding dry grains or coffee beans may scratch the surface. Not meant for very small quantity.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Vitamix is well known, it does a great job of what it was made to do, this is second vitamix, I purchased this one for my home kitchen, what I like best is that when you put in apples you don't have to remove the seeds,no need to core it, the vitamix will blend seed and core free smoothies
customer_reviews.author: traveler/bakery chef

customer_reviews.title: Will change how you eat.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. Why take vitamins when you can easily naturally get all of the vitamins and minerals you need in a shake or smoothie? We generally use it with protein powder with superfoods and mix in any fruit we want. I also make soups that always turn out well. This way you can control how much salt is in the soup, etc. The Vitamix is loud so we use it in another room.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this blender because it is more quiet than the device I used previously to make m smoothies and sauces. My eardrums thank you! I don’t wake my husband with my morning smoothie! Today, I made a roasted tomatillo sauce for a stew, and it was super easy. I like the different speeds, the pulse feature and the gentle rocking. The blender is easy to clean with a drop of soap, warm water and a spin!
customer_reviews.author: Dana K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment if you blend daily
customer_reviews.text: Discarded my blender and Ninja after using this Vitamix once. Changes the game when it comes to kale smoothies, making the texture very palatable...and, well, smooth. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: howboy

customer_reviews.title: powerful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender to make... smoothies! You guessed it! The Vitamin 310 is a huge upgrade from the last blender I had. It's definitely powerful (which means there will be a bit of noise) so don't go making a smoothie while on a Skype call and not think people will be a bit annoyed. I like this model because it's not too big, and really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: jenny wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Good Mixer But VERY Loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong mixer and easy to use and clean, but the downside is that it is too loud. I wear ear protection. Very happy, though, that it's not made by Procter and Gamble (I'm boycotting P&G because of Gillette's sexist war on testosterone).
customer_reviews.author: Triangle123

customer_reviews.title: Great... for about 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender in June 2018 and have used it on average once or twice a month. It worked great. However, it stopped working on me this morning. I was making a green smoothie so a blender like this should definitely be able to handle that. I have emailed the manufacturer and will update my review if they are willing to help fix it. Way too much money on a blender for such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R Strunk

customer_reviews.title: Expected more reliability for $350.00
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 years used 4 or 5 times. Died making hummus, a vitamix recipe no less. Expected more reliability for $350.00 thought I was buying near top of the line.......
customer_reviews.author: Robert96150

customer_reviews.title: Over rated, not all powerful as deemed so.
customer_reviews.text: I fell for it, 'this blender can do anything!'. No. It has limitations, and there is no distinct difference between other quality blenders. It is extremely loud with an average blending power. Do not buy this for $300 dollars...
customer_reviews.author: GetBloodEagled793

customer_reviews.title: It's noisy but it works great!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 10 years to buy one of these, and it's noisy as a lawn mower, but it works so well. We are trying very hard to eat healthy, as close to vegan and raw as possible, and this is a great tool. I keep a set of ear plugs next to the machine. My only complaint would be the noise. Great fast shipping from Amazon, and the product is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband thinks it is just great. I think it is loud
customer_reviews.text: It has a powerful motor. My husband thinks it is just great. I think it is loud. I frequently find chunks will land in the middle of the whirling blade and the stomper has has to be used. I am just leaving the stomper in place to prevent this. The lid can be a bit challenging to put on and take off. The on off switch is easy to bump and turn on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customermax H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: You know what you're doing when you buy this blender. You're not gonna spend $400 without knowing the capabilities and reputation of the brand. The only thing that really needs to be said is that this size (48 oz.) is perfect for a small family or single person.
customer_reviews.author: Stonerd

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This really has done what it says it will do. It's expensive (and this is the cheapest model), but so far it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: veronica2311

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and inefficient
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my vitamix. I make pretty standard fruit smoothies daily and pesto 2-3 times per week. Even with a large amount of liquid the blender gets stuck and I have to adjust multiple times. Even with adjustments, the smoothie is not coming out that smooth. And pesto? Forget about it! The blade misses 3/4 of the nuts! I couldn’t believe how poorly this machine worked, I genuinely believed I must have been missing a piece. I’m so deeply disappointed. Shame on you Vitamix for charging so much money for a subpar machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Super Diasappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Even a simple smoothie becomes a chore. I have to add a ton of liquid to get into to blend otherwise it just stalls out. Constantly have to mix it while making a banana and mango smoothie. Super loud as well. Wish I would have gone with a different model as I know they are great blenders.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyT

customer_reviews.title: Man, it this thing powerful.  A+
customer_reviews.text: This blender is everything I hoped for and more. Man, is it powerful. It blows the socks off my Breville blender that didn't make it past the two year mark. I highly recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: All bark, not bite
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this purchase. It does a great job of blending when it doesn't get stuck by frozen foods or spinach leaf stems. I was expecting more from this expensive machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I waited 2 years to buy a vitamix and I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: When you make the choice between a vitamix and a chair ... and you chose to sit on the floor ..WORTH IT..
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: To your health
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this sooner. I really love my vitamix. Easy to use, but it blends everything. I make a beet smoothie and the smoothie is well smooth, no chunks. I also make nut milk. I recommend this. Think of it as an investment in your health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is by far my favorite! I had my ninja blender for about 10 years so it was time for something new. I blended a smoothie and a strawberry daiquiri. The noise level was low to be compared to my old blender. Both drinks were extremely smooth and tasty. This was my Christmas gift to myself and well worth the money. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: octavia young

customer_reviews.title: Best model for simple everyday use for small blends that can hand thick sauces and frozen desserts.
customer_reviews.text: Only good things for this base model blender and the price was excellent. — Everything it’s hiped up to be. Only criticism is that a built-timer would be extremely helpful even on this base model.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.  Simple Controls
customer_reviews.text: It works great.. I prefer the manual control to "programs" and the dial is very easy to use. Once you have some experience--you can really tailor the speed to what you are trying to accomplish. with thick liquids the included push rod is great to eliminate the air pockets that can form
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: How Did I Ever Live Without a Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: After the 6th set of blades died in my other blender (Scooby Doo would say, "Rinja") I decided to try something different. I couldn't have made a better choice. The Vitamix makes the smoothest smoothies I have ever had. Everything rinses clean easily and the variable speed control is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McMillon

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to have a Vitamix. I have seen how it works before so I have always wanted one for myself. Just the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Romualdo S.

customer_reviews.title: Love my vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! Have this blender for almost a year and couldn’t be happier. Decided to purchase this after my cheaper blender broke. I was so surprise with how smooth and creamy the consistency was with everything I made. No clumps and you don’t need to add to much liquid to smoothies to get it all blended! Worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Purées food or whatever really well!
customer_reviews.text: I had never paid this much for a blender but I’m glad I did! Love it! I use it for everything and it purées everything really good. Even my husband uses it to make his protein shakes with ice, fruit and all types of nuts and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.  No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: The best fat coffee latte I have ever made or bought. Makes my whole day better when my morning starts with coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ogletree

customer_reviews.title: My first vitamix
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It'll blend anything I put in it. Of course this is probably the loudest model they make. Placing a rubber place mat under it takes the edge off.
customer_reviews.author: John Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level, not enough power
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level blender but just did not have enough power. Good for blending soft and easy mixtures but when it came to frozen berries or smoothies it just did not have enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix Explrian Blender is SO AMAZING! I was dead set against paying $350
customer_reviews.text: Vitamix Explrian Blender is SO AMAZING! I was dead set against paying $350.-$400. for a blender but also wanted something reliable that could actually BLEND difficult fruits with ice. Vitamix blends everything inside so perfectly that it's like drinking a smoother than smooth milkshake...HANDS DOWN! Best blender ever and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We use this blender every day to make Protein smoothies and all fruit and vegetable drinks. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Geis

customer_reviews.title: noisy however great blender
customer_reviews.text: its a great blender however had to return because of noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh Ghimire

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vita Mix...
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to be shipped to me, but arrived great! Have used daily since recieved.. So far so good. I have an older model can see some improvements with this new one.. A bit quiter, love the lower profile. Down the road will update with more use.. Happy so far👍
customer_reviews.author: gail Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I love my vita mix!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my vita mix! It’s night and day difference from a regular blender. I’ve made nut based sauces and icy smoothies and it is all perfectly velvety smooth. It’s new so still working out kinks with ingredients and it is a loud machine, but completely okay for the 10+ level of blending. Wouldn’t trade it for anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my first vitamix and I love it. Use it several times each day for smoothies, salad dressings, and much more. It breezes through nuts and dates. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy when the blender arrived
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when the blender arrived. That was a big mistake. The blender besides being extremely loud; had a top that did not fit on correctly and the container kept rotating around on the base when the blender was on.I had watched a demo at Costco and the blender being demonstrated did not have these problems. I sent it back immediately and now am not sure if I would purchase a Vitamix again.
customer_reviews.author: Mauijade

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender because my research showed other less expensive ones either were painfully loud and fell short at blending completely some of the fiber rich ingredients of my green smoothies. Smoothies, salsa, cocktails are great, and clean-up is so easy. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danell R.

customer_reviews.title: too expensive, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is not worth the price. Does not blend certain foods. One example is beets. No matter how long I been theta always a solid piece of beets in there. Also the spout on the jug spills smoothie after you pour it. Spout is hard to clean and so is the jug. I am going to have to buy the most expensive one now and not very happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Sara weatherman

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I just started making smoothies and a few people recommended the Vitamix. I love my Vitamix E310. I got the 48 oz and it's perfect for two people. Have not made any soups in it yet but my smoothies come out perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves it, she uses the same model for work everyday. Time came when ours took a dump and got her this, she loves it and from what she tells me it's well worth the money. Some packaging damage to the box but nothing happened to the product. 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for myself and my husband
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for myself and my husband. POWERFUL machine that never fails. I’ve made smoothies, soups, nut butter, nut milk, hummus, sauces, pesto. But this amazing blender. It’s awesome top quality, you’ll regret you didn’t buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: O Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Blinds seeds and hard veggies into liquid. Smoothies can be a little too frothy without enough ice
customer_reviews.author: book

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is the real deal. It blends anything you put in it. I really makes smooth smoothies. I would expect nothing less from Vitamix. After all this is what smoothie companies use. It’s a must have in any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Drew McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in a while. Before I would purchase smoothies every morning from Smoothie King at $8-$10 prr smoothie. This blender pays for itself in under a year easily. I've used it every day since I purchased back in November. Appears to be built well. I will update this review after a year of ownership. Only negative I have is the noise level when blending. I'm not sure if its possible to get around this though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Alston

customer_reviews.title: This things about to do some serious kitchen work
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Vitamix 3600 from the 70's that still got almost daily use. Still was holding up pretty well after almost 50 years! Seemed like a no brainer to go with Vitamix again now that its time to retire the 3600. Was very impressed with how my regular smoothie was silky smooth and all the nuts and seeds were completely blended in my drink. Super powerful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The highest quality blender I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Wife has been buying cheap blenders and replacing it when they break. No More! It would be hard to go back to a regular blender after using the ultimate blender.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tortorice

customer_reviews.title: What a great blender and so much more~
customer_reviews.text: We lover this machine!!! It does more then we ever expected! We are in the process of getting one for our mom, it is that good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Our Healing Villlage9

customer_reviews.title: Supreme vitamix!
customer_reviews.text: I have put off buying this mixer because of the price. My husband wanted it so we got it and we LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy C.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for very noisy blender
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a very noisy blender and glad we did. It is relatively quiet and does a wonderful job on anything we have used it for so far. Makes great mango daiquiris.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Payton

customer_reviews.title: This is an incredible blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is amazing. I primarily bought it for juicing, and it makes really smooth smoothies. The texture of green smoothies is super important if you are long-term going to drink green smoothies and actually finish them, and this blender nails the texture. I wish it was a little quieter on its highest speeds, but other than that nothing but impressed by this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Wright

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t blend too well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t blend too well. It feels fake and leaves chunk of food behind
customer_reviews.author: Tejal Patel

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender. Had it for 2 days and have made about 8 smoothies. Won't have to go to Tropical Smoothie any more. Works great. Was packed really well too.
customer_reviews.author: LisaT

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Great blender for a great price for the quality. Chops and blends very well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Horn

product_meta.title: Vitamix E310 Explorian Blender, Professional-Grade, 48 oz. Container, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Blender

Vitamix fuels passions. It’s why we’re the brand most trusted by professional chefs. But you won’t just find us in restaurant kitchens. You’ll also find us in home kitchens around the world. Because whether you’re interested in the culinary arts, making healthier choices, or enjoying restaurant-quality smoothies at home—when you’re ready to move on and move up, when you’re ready to invest in your passion, you’re ready for Vitamix.

Built to Last
A bargain blender's not a bargain if it doesn't last. We know purchasing a Vitamix blender is an investment. But Vitamix blenders are built to last, helping you buy dependable, not disposable.

Easy to Clean
Just blend warm water and a drop of dish soap at your machine's highest speed, and watch it self-clean in 60 seconds or less - no disassembly required.

The Difference Is in the Blend
Since the number-one reason people purchase a blender is to make smoothies, it’s important to get them right. Whether you prefer an icy blend or a perfectly smooth purée, nutrition-packed with veggies or a light, fruity treat, Vitamix smoothies give you a delicious, even blend in every sip. 

Power
We don’t aim to have the highest horsepower. You don’t need more horses; you need trained ones. The focused power of our complete blending system causes every component of the Vitamix machine to work together, creating faster, smoother blends packed with flavor. 

The Universal Tool
Make smoothies & juices, hot soups, flours & dough, nut butter, frozen desserts, batters, dressings & sauces, non-dairy milks, and more. 

Manufactured in Cleveland, Ohio USA
feature_bullets: Variable Speed Control: Ten variable speeds allow you to refine every texture with culinary precision, from the smoothest purées to the heartiest soups
Pulse Feature: Layer coarse chops over smooth purées for heartier recipes, such as chunky salsas or thick vegetable soups.
The 48-ounce container is ideal for blending medium batches for small family meals. Cutting blades measuring 3-inch diameter to ensure a consistent blend every time. Electrical Ratings-120 V

Hardened Stainless-Steel Blades: Our aircraft-grade stainless steel blades are designed to handle the toughest ingredients, so from the first blend to the last, you get the same quality results. Cord length: 4.5 feet
Self-Cleaning: With a drop of dish soap and warm water, your Vitamix machine can clean itself in 30 to 60 seconds. What's in the Box: motor base, 48 oz. container, mini-tamper, cookbook
Design Feature: Radial cooling fan and thermal protection system
